Key: Phew, that should do it.

(Phew. I didn't expect to have after-school duties
today... No one's left in the classroom but me.)

(Well, I still have to get ready for dinner, but I have
time. I'll drop by the market to pick up some food.)
Oh...

(Come to think of it, Rinne said she's going to be
handling it. Then I have nothing else I can think of
doing. Hm... I guess I'll just go home and help Rinne.)

(Wait a minute... That girl waiting at the gates, could
it be...)
Well it's about time, Onii-chan.

Ah, so it was you, Kotori. What are you doing here?
Oh, were you looking for Reine-san?
Ne-ga-to-ry.
Jeez, I was waiting for you.
Oh, really? It's rare for you to come pick me up.

I do it when I feel like, okay?! Jeez, you don't get
me at all.
Sorry, sorry. I had after-school duty today.

Well, don't worry. It's not like I had anything specific
on the docket. I just wanted to hang out with you
and walk home together.
Huh? Hang out? It's really rare for you to say that...

What's that? Are you saying you don't want to hang
out with your adorable little sister?

No, that's not it. I was just thinking how we haven't
done much of that lately.

That may be true. Hehehe. I just feel like hanging out
today!
All right. Wanna drop by the arcade, then?
Huh, the arcade?
Then where do you want to go?
Oh, look! I found darling!
(I heard a clear voice from behind...)

Gosh～! I was watching all the students walking home
when I realized you weren't in the crowd, darling. I was
so worried!
Miku...?! You, too?!
What do you mean, "You, too?"
Oh! Kotori-chan!
Oh, it's Miku～ Herro!

*Giggle*... Hello, Kotori-chan. You're as adorable as
usual.
Hehe. You won't get anything for complimenting me.
I'm only stating the obvious. I want to hug you～
NO!
(Kotori swiftly dodged Miku's arms. So swift...)

I'm going to go hang out with Onii-chan～ I don't have
time to hang out with you, Miku!

Awww... But I was waiting, though. Please take me with
you～

(That's true. It'd be messed up to just say bye to her
here.)

It'd be rude to just leave her behind. Can't we bring
Miku along?
Mmm. I guess we can't help it. Got it!

Yay, I'm so excited! So do you know where you want to
go?

I'm fine going anywhere, as long as you're there,
darling!
I want to go somewhere we never usually go～

A place we've never gone, huh? Why don't we head to the
station, then? Let's think about it as we walk.

(God knows who's going to pass by the front of the
school and start spreading rumors.)
Okay, darling. Let's go!
Let's go, go, go!
Agh, you guys! I can't walk when you hold on like this!

Oh, come to think of it, I have a coupon for karaoke.
Wanna go?
Aww... Karaoke?

I am totally for it. I will sing from the bottom of my
heart for you, darling ♪
We've gone before, so no!
A-Aww! I was just about to shine...
Sorry, Miku. Then what do you want to do?
(No arcade, no karaoke. Then what's left is―)
Onii-chan, I want to go somewhere I can move my body!
Oh, that's great. I'm all for it!
Move our bodies... huh.
(What's a good spot...)

I think there was a general amusement arcade near the
station. Wanna check that out?

That's a nice idea, darling. They have darts, a pool
table, bowling and lots of other things.
Oh, bowling! I want to bowl!
Got it, bowling it is. Miku, are you okay with that?
Yes! Totally!
Miku, are you good at bowling?
Hmm, so-so? I don't think I'm terrible.
I see. Then I can't wait to see what you're made of.
How about you, Kotori-chan?

Mmm. It's been a while for me. I'm not that confident,
but I'm going to defeat my brother!

Kotori, you're so cute, wanting to compete against
your brother! Then, why don't we team up and aim to
defeat darling?
Yeah! I'm gonna win!

It's been a while, so can't we just enjoy it rather
than competing...?

(Well I guess it's nice that they're enjoying it...
It's not often that we come here, so I'll just go
with the flow.)

(The bowling alley on a weekday. Even though it's the
evening, not too many people are here. Just a few
other parties aside from us.)
(We were able to get a lane when...)

*Whimper*... The ball's so heavy. I won't be able to
throw iiit...

Why don't you just use the kids' size? It'll be easier to
throw it, no?
Awww, that's why I don't like these kinds of sports...

(I guess not many kids visit here, so there weren't
any around. We needed to go to the counter to ask for
one, but Kotori refused, so she's using a heavy ball.)
If you're too shy, I can go get it?
DON'T NEED IT! Come on, let's go!
(She worries me...)
Awww, not another gutter ball...
It'll be fine, Kotori-chan. I'll avenge you!
Avenge... Kotori just messed up.
Forget the minor details! Here I go!
(She's swinging really hard?!)
Oops, I may have curved it too much...!
Oh, so close! It totally curved!

Sorry, Kotori-chan. I messed up～ I'll be sure to get
it in next time, okay?!
That's pretty scary... I can't let my guard down.
It's your turn next, darling!
All right, you watch.

(We continued to bowl and I was able to maintain the
lead.)

(Miku's scoring a lot. Kotori's bowling granny-style,
but at least she stopped getting gutter balls. We
could've avoided this if she had gotten a kids' ball.)
(Finally we're at the end—It's Miku's turn.)
Mikuuu. You'd better score, or else we'll lose!

Don't worry, Kotori-chan. An idol always makes it
come together at the end.
No hard feelings, okay?
Okay! Girls always win these things ♪ Yah!
Whoa?! That's...?
This is going to be good.
All right! I got eight!
Woooow! Keep going!
We did it, Kotori-chan! Spare!
Finish off Onii-chan!
Uh, but she needs more than six to beat me—
Leave it to me! Here I go! Yah!
This looks like...!

(The ball spun furiously and slowly bore down on the
center pin!)
Whoa! Amazing, Miku! A strike! STRIKE!
Hehe, I did it! I did it, Kotori-chan!
Damn it, she really did do it at the end...
(I never expected her to beat me for real.)

Okaaaay, so you lose, Onii-chan! The loser has to be
punished!
Hehe. What should we make him do?
Um... I never promised I'd do it, though.
(But I did lose. Maybe I can't avoid it...)

Hmmm. That was so fun! Gourmet ice cream after
bowling tastes so much sweeter!

(As punishment, I had to buy them really expensive
gourmet ice cream. Well, as long as they're happy, I
guess all is well.)

Yes, I had so much fun today. I want to try something
else next time.
I heard there are places we can play tennis and futsal.
Wow, cool! Then let's do something else next time!

Yeah... It's more fun to play sports. Next time, let's
bring Tohka-san and Rinne-san, too!
Yeah, I totally agree! It'll be so fun with everyone!

Haha, you're right. Let's find some time for all of us
to come together.

Well, I think you need to prepare to lose again next
time.

What... How dare you say that, little sister. I'm gonna
show you what I'm made of!
Hahaha! You're just like Kaguya!
She has a point there... Hehe.

Ah... Well, forget about that for now. Let's head
home. We'll be making Rinne wait if we take too much
time.
Oh that's right, huh? Then let's go home!
Aww, Kotori-chan! Wait for me!
Man, after all that exercise...

(I feel like it's been a while since I played like
this. It was actually really fun. I'm glad we were able
to share the experience together.)
